CustomField.description: Replaces Event: Description. When the customer clicks an "Add to Calendar" link on the event, this text is the body of the calendar item. By default, the Event Name, Start Time, End Time, and Venue information are included.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Replaces Event: Description. When the customer clicks an "Add to Calendar" link on the event, this text is the body of the calendar item. By default, the Event Name, Start Time, End Time, and Venue information are included.
CustomField.label: Calendar Reminder Text
